original_title: Death Made Up- สืบจากศพ ตอน มรณกรรมจำแลง
overview: From a self-hanging suicide case turned into a stealthy murder case. With background Complicated in connection with the football table of influential gamblers, the gamblers must go to the end in the same way if with the skills of one of Thailand's top forensic doctors.  You will lead us to touch a clue of the murder. That even the police department was unexpected !!!
title: Death Made Up- สืบจากศพ ตอน มรณกรรมจำแลง
